description: This file defines a React functional component called FiltersSidebar, which provides a user interface for filtering products based on various facets such as sizes, colors, price ranges, and more. It includes rendering logic for filter options, handling of selected filters, counts, and user interactions like toggling filters and clearing all filters.

methods.name: FiltersSidebar({ facets, selected, counts, onToggle, onClear })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a sidebar with product filter options, managing filter toggling, display of active filters, and clear functionality.

ctags.name: FiltersSidebar
ctags.pattern: /^export default function FiltersSidebar({ facets, selected, counts, onToggle, onClear }) {$/
